Basic linear algebraÂ¶

This chapter describes Elemental’s support for basic linear algebra routines, such as matrix-matrix multiplication, triangular solves, and matrix-vector multiplication. Most of these routines have counterparts in the Basic Linear Algebra Subprograms (BLAS).

  • Level 1
    • Adjoint
    • Axpy
    • Conjugate
    • Copy
    • DiagonalScale
    • DiagonalSolve
    • Dot
    • Dotc
    • Dotu
    • MakeTrapezoidal
    • Nrm2
    • Scal
    • ScaleTrapezoid
    • Transpose
    • Zero
  • Level 2
    • Gemv
    • Ger
    • Gerc
    • Geru
    • Hemv
    • Her
    • Her2
    • Symv
    • Syr
    • Syr2
    • Trmv
    • Trsv
  • Level 3
    • Gemm
    • Hemm
    • Her2k
    • Herk
    • Hetrmm
    • Symm
    • Syr2k
    • Syrk
    • Trmm
    • Trr2k
    • Trrk
    • Trsm
  • Tuning parameters
    • LocalHemvBlocksize
    • LocalSymvBlocksize
    • LocalTrrkBlocksize
    • LocalTrr2kBlocksize
